short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn fun badges while exploring the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyber Badges is a chrome extension that allows you to earn fun badges for your everyday online browsing that you can show off to your friends. Earn points and compete with others to be the prove you have the biggest presence on the World Wide Web!
